concept.title: Recovery
concept.shortdesc: JDBC Consumer uses offset values in the offset column to determine where to continue processing after a deliberate or unexpected stop. To ensure seamless recovery, use a primary key or indexed column as the offset column.

conbody.p: JDBC Consumer originrecoveryrecoveryJDBC ConsumerAs JDBC Consumer processes data, it tracks the offset value internally. When the pipeline stops, JDBC Consumer notes where it stopped processing data. When you restart the pipeline, it continues from the last-saved offset.
